title: Tosher Chossid Passes Away
body: Tosher chossid Reb Tzvi Aryeh (Hersh Leib) Weinberger z”l, 102, passed away on Erev Shabbos Kodesh Parshas Vayeira. He was among the last to put on tefillin from the Minchas Yitzchak.

title: Opposition Unites Against Draft Law
body: Opposition leaders Yair Lapid, Benny Gantz, Avigdor Lieberman, and Yair Golan unite against the Giyus law and judicial reform, vowing to fight in the Knesset and on the streets.

title: Edelstein on Giyus Law
body: Likud MK Yuli Edelstein reveals behind-the-scenes conversations with chareidi politicians, including Moti Babchik, on failed efforts to broker a compromise on the Giyus law.

title: Rabbi Yaakov Dovid Brim
body: Rabbi Yaakov Dovid Brim z”l, 47, passed away at Sheba Medical Center after suffering a sudden stroke. A beloved photographer and devoted Torah scholar, his warmth and humility touched countless lives.
